scriptmanager.objects

Class ReadFragmentCartoon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • scriptmanager.objects.ReadFragmentCartoon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ReadFragmentCartoon
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Component that displays a graphic of a sequenced DNA fragment with annotated Read1, Read2, and dynamically updating encoding reference points marked by arrows.
    Author:
    Olivia Lang
    See Also:
    TagPileupWindow, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • redrawArrows

        public void redrawArrows(int aspect,
                         int read)
        Update graphic to reflect changes in aspect and read encodings.
        Parameters:
        aspect - encoding for read aspect (5', 3', midpoint, full frag) as defined by PileupParameters
        read - encoding for read output (R1, R2, or both) as defined by PileupParameters
        See Also:
        PileupParameters

      • bigArrow

        public java.awt.Polygon bigArrow()
        A rightward-pointing arrow across length of DNA fragment. (unused)
        Legacy code for how Full Fragment was initially represented.
        Returns:
        a Polygon object describing the coordinates of a large, right-pointing arrow

      • arrow

        public java.awt.Polygon arrow(int x,
                              int y)
        Draw downward-pointing arrow at (x,y) coordinate (upper-center) for marking where on the DNA fragment coverage is tallied on this graphic. Arrow size is arrowHeight tall (15px) and flank*2 (6px) wide. 
           (x,y)
    ||
    ||
    ||
    ||
   \  /
    \/
        Parameters:
        x - center (width) coordinate of arrow to draw
        y - top coordinate of arrow to draw
        Returns:
        a Polygon object describing a small down-pointing arrow
